About

Searchex is a new search engine written in pure Elixir
  • GitHub Project
  • Gitter Chat
  • Hex Package
  • API Docs
Service PhoenixRails
Web Server Elixir Nginx
Load Balancer Elixir HAProxy
KV Server Elixir Redis
Cache Daemon Elixir Memcached
Job Queue Elixir Sidekiq
Process Monitor Elixir Monit
Performance GraphsElixir RRD/Graphite
Search Engine Elixir SearchexElastic Search

Searchex has a simple CLI, a scalable API, and sharable document Repos. Searchex is ready for testing but not for production.
